title: Ty's homemade band
creator_credit: Evergreen Productions, Phoenix Film and Gary Templeton
brief_description: A stranger appears in town and helps a group of young children form their own homemade band, with the instruments made out of domestic utensils, and the children put on a concert for the neighbourhood. Ty’s one man band by Mildred Pitts Walter.
creator_credit_for_label: Evergreen Productions, Phoenix Film and Gary Templeton
